registration.title: Registration
registration.terms: I agree to the terms and conditions
registration.password-mismatch: Password and confirmation do not match
registration.accept-terms: You must agree to the terms and conditions
registration.firstName-max: First name can have a maximum of {max} characters
registration.lastName-max: Last name can have a maximum of {max} characters
registration.password-too-short: Password must be at least 8 characters long
registration.password-too-long: Password can have a maximum of 64 characters
registration.password-weak: Password must contain at least one number and one special character
registration.registration-success-detail: A confirmation email will be sent to you to complete the registration
registration.password-no-digit: Password must contain at least one number.
registration.password-no-special: Password must contain at least one special character.

reset-password.title: Reset Password
reset-password.subtitle: Enter your new password and confirm it
reset-password.email-was-send: Reset password email was successfully sent.

resend-verification-email.title: Resend Verification Email
resend-verification-email.subtitle: Enter your email and we will send you a new verification link.

errors.missing-email-password: Please fill in email and password.
errors.missing-password-fields: Please fill in the missing fields

steps.start-age-smoking: At what age did you start smoking?
steps.stop-age-smoking: At what age did you stop smoking?
steps.quit-timeframe: When do you plan to quit?
steps.past-smoker: No, but I used to smoke

alcohol.title: Alcohol Consumption
alcohol.instruction: Enter the number of each drink you consume per week.
alcohol.studyNote: (According to study: baseline is ≤100 g/week; at >100–≤200 g life is shortened by 6 months, at >200–≤350 g by 1–2 years, and at >350 g by 4–5 years.)
alcohol.noConsumption: User does not report alcohol consumption.

physical-activity.title: Physical Activity
physical-activity.moderateText: Activity with intensity 3–5.9 MET (e.g., brisk walking (4.8–6.5 km/h), slow cycling (15 km/h), painting/decorating, vacuuming, gardening (lawn mowing), golf (pushing a cart), tennis (doubles), social dancing and water aerobics). Breathing is accelerated, but conversation in full sentences is possible.
physical-activity.vigorousText: Activity with intensity ≥6 MET (e.g., power walking, jogging or running, cycling at speeds over 15 km/h, strenuous gardening (continuous digging or plowing), swimming in a pool, and tennis (singles)). Breathing is very rapid and conversation is difficult.
physical-activity.exerciseMinutes: Number of exercise minutes per week
physical-activity.studyNote: (Based on a study: reaching the recommended level of physical activity can extend life by approximately 5 years.)

final.title: Final step: Estimated life expectancy
final.changeLifeExpectancy: Here you can change the expected life span:
final.calendarGeneration: Age for which the Memonto Mori calendar is generated

tooltips.physicalActivity: Physical Activity in the Prevention and Treatment of Coronary Artery Disease
tooltips.food: Estimating impact of food choices on life expectancy: A modeling study
tooltips.smokingLoss: The price of a cigarette: 20 minutes of life?

life.congratulationsMessage: Congratulations, you have lived longer than expected.

tooltips.valuesAlignment: Rating of whether you acted in alignment with your values during the week
